mapper.select: select order_num, c_id, s_code, order_status, order_date, o_totalprice from order_list ol where c_id=#{c_id} and order_status not in ('장바구니') order by ol.order_num desc

select order_num, c_id, s_code, order_status, order_date, o_totalprice from order_list ol where c_id=#{c_id} and order_status='장바구니'
order by ol.order_num desc
mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_LIST (order_num, c_id, s_code, order_status, order_payment, order_date, o_totalprice) values (#{order_num},#{c_id},#{s_code},#{order_status}, #{order_payment}, sysdate, #{o_totalprice})
mapper.update: update order_list set order_date = sysdate, o_totalprice = o_totalprice + #{o_totalprice} where c_id = #{c_id} and order_status = '장바구니'

update order_list set order_num = (select max(order_num) from order_lis) , order_date = sysdate , order_payment = #{order_payment} , order_status = '결제완료' where c_id = #{c_id} and order_status = '장바구니'
